scenes.background: You suggested delegating but expressed concern about complications. [Monica] and [Bob] join the conversation.
scenes.description: 'I see your point. Maybe we can split the tasks more clearly?' He leans back, crossing his arms.

options.text: That might work, Bob. Let's outline the tasks together.
options.analysis: You show a balanced approach by agreeing to collaborate, demonstrating good social skills and self-regulation.

options.text: I think it's better if I handle the key parts myself.
options.analysis: You show high empathy and emotional perception by taking on the main tasks, but it may impact your self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: Splitting tasks sounds smart, but I'm worried about coordination issues.
options.analysis: You demonstrate good self-regulation and social skills by considering task division, but emotional perception could be improved.
